application.doc: Receiving a personal certificate into a certificate database

method.name: POST
method.doc: To complete the operation with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the SSL Certificates personal certificate resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: operation
param.doc: The type of create operation to perform. In this case, the value is "receive".

param.name: default
param.doc: Defines whether this new certificate is the default certificate. The value is "yes" or "no".

param.name: cert
param.doc: The personal certificate to be received. This value can be either a string or a file. Passing a string "cert" : ""-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE---- cert string here -----END CERTIFICATE-----" OR passing a file e.g. "cert":"The certificate to receive" (as application/octet-stream)

response.doc:
200 ok
